# shortcutRole

**Instance Property**

The role of the relevant shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
var shortcutRole: INRelevantShortcutRole { get set }
```

## Discussion

The role provides a hint to Siri so it can provide a better experience to the user when suggesting the shortcut. The default is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRelevantShortcutRole/action].

## Accessing Relevant Shortcut Information

- **shortcut**: A reference to the shortcut used to create the relevant shortcut.
- **INRelevantShortcutRole**: Roles for a relevant shortcut.
